title: Mobile Learning Design for Elementary Education Tablet Integration Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and introductory understanding of elementary education
context.additional_context: Emphasizing competency in designing tech-integrated lessons, exploring applicability in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Propose tablet-based mathematics lesson design strategies grounded in the TPACK (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge) framework.
Develop three or more elementary mathematics activity examples applying the five metaphors of mobile learning (toolbox, creative thinking, engagement facilitation, shared desktop, connected world).
Analyze the educational potential of tablets in technology-constrained environments (smartphone-centric) and write a report.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
